org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api

Interface NodeListener


  • public interface NodeListener
    An interface defining a node listener. The NodeListener interface provides a notification when a new node is found on the network, when it is updated, and when it is removed. The notification is always sent after the function has been updated within the stack.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nodeAdded(ZigBeeNode node)
      Notification that a new device has been added.
      void nodeRemoved(ZigBeeNode node)
      Notification that a device has been removed from the network.
      void nodeUpdated(ZigBeeNode node)
      Notification that a device has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • nodeAdded

        void nodeAdded(ZigBeeNode node)
        Notification that a new device has been added. This is called after all endpoint discovery is complete
        Parameters:
        device -

      • nodeUpdated

        void nodeUpdated(ZigBeeNode node)
        Notification that a device has changed. Possibly the network address has been updated.
        Parameters:
        node -

      • nodeRemoved

        void nodeRemoved(ZigBeeNode node)
        Notification that a device has been removed from the network.
        Parameters:
        node -
